programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Новенькая
programme.desc: В элитную школу для детей богатых родителей попадает Вера - девушка из обычной семьи. Она сразу оказывается в центре запутанной детективной интриги и школьных конфликтов, и, конечно же, романтической истории. Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...

programme.title: Crown Vic
programme.desc: Follows one memorable night in the life of LAPD officer Ray Mandel while hunting two cop killers on the loose.

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: Blind Obsession
programme.desc: During a gun battle with a pair of criminal brothers, police officer Jack Fletcher (Brad Johnson) incurs a wound that leaves him temporarily sightless. During his recovery, Jack is helped by Rebecca (Megan Gallagher), who works as a "trainer" for the newly blind. Gradually, Jack and Rebecca fall in love, much to the dismay of Rebeccas overprotective sister, Bedelia (Roxana Zal), who as a childhood incest victim has developed a pathological hatred for all men. Thus, once his sight is restored, Jack finds himself in the crosshairs of two potential assassins -- the demented Bedelia, and the brother of the crook he killed.

programme.title: Malpractice
programme.desc: Here is a surgeon. He cant practice medicine anymore because he has panic attacks, while reliving a surgery gone bad. His wife is a medical malpractice attorney who picks up a case from a woman who was her husbands nurse.

programme.title: Stones
programme.desc: A melodramatic story of a woman who desires to meet a husband at a quarry where ten men work. Marek Piaček composed the music based on the libretto of Mila Haugovás poems translated into English. Kamene (Stones) by director Katarína Kerekesová, was the winner at the Fano International Film Festival in Italy

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Music critic Bob is out of a job, addicted to Zoloft, and trying to wrangle the menagerie of animals that his wife Amy has accumulated. Will adopting a baby cure their existential angst? Or should they just rescue another duck?

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: A heartbroken American in Florence gets involved in a dangerous local sport -- and with an alluring local woman.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Donald P. Sinclair has placed six separate gold coins in different slot machines in his casino. The lucky six who find these coins discover an opportunity of a lifetime. The chance to own $2 million. Locked up in a locker in New Mexico, these six contestants must now race each other, to be the first to the cash. There are no rules in place and everything that could possibly happen, does. Whilst, behind the scenes, Sinclairs associates are placing their bets.

programme.title: Back in the Day
programme.desc: A young boxer is taken under the wing of a mob boss after his Mother dies and his Father is run out of town for being an abusive alcoholic.

programme.title: Riot
programme.desc: Copper Jack Stone purposefully orchestrates a bank robbery in order to be thrown into prison with the notorious Russian kingpin Balam. Balam is more than just a mob criminal; hes a very cunning and dangerous lord who controls the police force from behind bars. Balam lives in prison as a cover for his real power, which is King of the city. His cell is a lavish private room built specifically for him, inaccessible to most in the depths of the prison structure. Even the warden fears venturing into his area of the prison. However, even surrounded by his loyal henchmen and guards in his sectioned off fortress, Balam doesnt know Jack is coming for him to avenge his family, who Balam murdered in cold blood. Balam is tough... but Jack is tougher.

programme.title: Musketeers Forever
programme.desc: A group of ex-secret agents opens a Jazz Club in Las Vegas. When they discover that a local Indian reservation is being threatened by a greedy and powerful gangster, they act. All for one, and one for all!

programme.title: Train Master
programme.desc: 62 year old Jeremiah Wilson is truly the Train Master of Willamette Western Railroad. He lives, breaths, and eats railroad. When Brett Banner, 32 year old heir to New York Eastern talks his dad into purchasing Willamette Western, there is immediately a clash between himself and Jeremiah. Jeremiah is fired by Brett two years from retirement and turns into a angry, depressed grandfather. When Bretts nine year old son Justin realizes Jeremiahs grandson Thomas can drive a locomotive, he kidnaps and holds Thomas favorite dinosaur ransom. Justin, Thomas and 3 other children board an old engine in for repairs and accidentally turns it into runaway engine causing a chain reaction of events.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Digging Into China
programme.desc: Harriet, a ten-year old girl, lives together with her big sister and her alcoholic mother out in the countryside. The family runs a motel. Harriet is different from the others, as she owns a great creativity and has nobody to play with. Her infinite world exists only in her mind. One day, Ricky comes along. He is a grown-up, but retarded son of an elderly lady. Soon, Harriet and Ricky share their experiences of life from a different point of view and become close friends. But his mother still plans to give Ricky away into professional care in a home, because she wont live forever to be there for him.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: In the near future our government will decide who is expendable.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: A man steps out of a park fountain in Ho Chi Minh City with no recollection of who he is or where he came from. As he wanders through the city, piecing together clues to his past, he is relentlessly pursued by mysterious figures.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

programme.title: Burbuļvannas Laika Mašīna
programme.desc: Pēc trakas ballītes, neskaitāmiem dzērieniem un "kokteiļa bākā" četri labākie draugi pamostas astoņdesmitajos. Viņi, protams, neatceras, kas notika iepriekšējā naktī un kā viņi nokļuva 1986.

programme.title: P.S. Es mīlu tevi
programme.desc: Holija Kenedija ir skaista, gudra un precējusies ar savu mūža mīlestību - kaislīgu, jautru un impulsīvu īru puisi Geriju. Taču kad slimība atņem Gerija dzīvību, Holijas dzīvei arī vairs nav jēgas. Vienīgais, kurš spētu palīdzēt, ir cilvēks, kura vairs nav. Neviens nepazīst Holiju labāk kā Gerijs. To viņš apzinājās vēl dzīvs būdams, un tāpēc uzrakstīja Holijai vēstules, kas palīdzēs bēdās un ļaus sākt dzīvi no jauna.

programme.title: Amerikāņu afēra
programme.desc: Filmas sižeta pamatā ir septiņdesmito gadu beigās reāli notikusi speciālā operācija "Abscam", kuras laikā, lai noķertu zagtu mantu tirgoņus, bija paredzēts viņu vidē iefiltrēt FIB aģentus. Operācija izvērtās par korupcijas perēkli visos līmeņos...

programme.title: Robots vārdā Čapijs
programme.desc: Čaplijs - brīnumbērns. Kā jau jebkurš bērns, viņš nokļūs savas apkārtējās vides ietekmē un tikai viņa sirds un dvēsele palīdz atrast savu īsto ceļu. Tomēr ir viena lieta, kāpēc Čaplijs nav līdzīgs visiem pārējiem - viņš ir pirmais robots, kurš spēj just un domāt.

programme.title: Paspēt laikā
programme.desc: Topošais tētis Pīters atrodas uz nervu sabrukuma robežas, kā arī vairāku tūkstošu kilometru attālumā no savas sievas, kurai ir palikušas piecas dienas līdz bērna nākšanai pasaulē. Un Pītera nerviem galīgi nenāk par labu apstāklis, ka garajā un neprātīgajā ceļojumā, kas viņam būs jāveic, par viņa kompanjonu kļūst godkārīgais aktieris Ītans.

programme.title: Ātrāk
programme.desc: 10 gadus pavadot cietumā, Braucējam ir bijis tikai viens mērķis - atriebt sava brāļa nāvi. Tagad viņš ir brīvībā un gatavs ķerties pie savas nāvējošās misijas, tomēr viņa ceļā stājas divi vīri - izbijis policists un jauns, egocentrisks slepkava.

programme.title: Ceļojums uz Ameriku
programme.desc: Āfrikas monarhs Eims uzzinājis, ka viņam ASV ir sen pazudis dēls. Viņam jāatgriežas Amerikā, lai satiktu šo negaidīto mantinieku un izveidotu attiecības ar savu dēlu.

programme.title: Kā tu to zini?

programme.title: Beidzot rītausma

programme.title: Jauns sākums
programme.desc: Greta un viņas draugs Deivs ir muzikanti un dziesmu autori, kuri ir kopā jau ilgus gadus kopš koledžas laikiem. Brīdī, kad Deivs saņem piedāvājumu ierakstīt albumu no lielas ierakstu kompānijas, viņi pārvācas uz dzīvi Ņujorkā. Jauniegūtās slavas savaldzināts Deivs pamet Gretu un uzsāk savu jauno mūziķa karjeru.

programme.title: Maigās jūtas
programme.desc: Kādā jaukā dienā Natalī noskūpsta savu kolēģi Markusu. Bez jebkāda iemesla - tāpat vien. Noskūpsta un pat nepievērš tam uzmanību. Taču Markuss nepaliek vienaldzīgs: nejaušs skūpsts apgriež viņa dzīvi kājām gaisā! Tagad viņš nevar domāt ne par ko citu, kā vien par Natalī. Vai Natalī atbildēs viņa jūtām?

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: 1959. gadā Trūmens Kapote uzzina par ģimenes slepkavību Kanzasā, un nolemj par šo lietu uzrakstīt grāmatu. Meklējot faktus savam romānam "In Cold Blood", Kapote izveido attiecības ar vienu no slepkavām Periju Smitu, kuram piespriests nāves sods.

programme.title: Mēs nekad neesam bijuši moderni
programme.desc: Helēna gatavojas dzemdēt un sagaida rožainu nākotni modernā pilsētā, esot veiksmīga jauna rūpnīcas vadītāja sieva.

programme.title: Rozā sapņos
programme.desc: Stāsts par mīlestību fantāzijas pilnā pasaulē, kur mīļotie uz satikšanos lido rozā mākoņos un dejo grieztos, kur parastā dzīvoklī dzīvo saule un peles sarunājas ar kaķiem, kur ziedi aug cilvēkos un sirds siltums spēj iznīcināt visnāvējošākos ieročus.

programme.title: Privilēģijas būt vienam
programme.desc: Jautrs un aizkustinošs stāsts par pusaudžu problēmām, kura pamatā ir Stīvena Čobska tāda paša nosaukuma bestsellers, kas jau kļuvis par mūsdienu klasiku. Romāns aizraujoši un patiesi attēlo kāpumus un kritumus pusaudža ceļā uz pilngadību.

programme.title: Mēs nekad neesam bijuši moderni

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Best Bite In Town
programme.desc: Newport. Noah Cappe, Tiffani Faison and Shota Nakajima explore the food scene in Newport, Rhode Island. They taste everything from chowder and noodles to burgers and biscuits.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.desc: Sweets For Barbie. Jesse Palmer celebrates Warner Bros. Pictures movie event, Barbie! He challenges the bakers to make desserts inspired by Barbies signature colour, pink!

programme.title: Giada at Home
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis is an outstanding culinary specialist, the author of nine New York Times bestselling cookbooks, Emmy award winning television personality and the host of Giada at Home television show. Giada has quite an impressive background of culinary training from Le Cordon Bleu in Paris, which combined with her own unique Californian charm creates her one-of-a-kind recognizable style. In Giada at Home she focuses on cooking at home for friends and family for different occasions and on party planning. Holiday feast or romantic dinner, weekend vibes or average day, it does not matter- the food is always delicious.

Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Summer Baking Championship
programme.desc: Sweets For Barbie. Jesse Palmer celebrates Warner Bros. Pictures movie event, Barbie! He challenges the bakers to make desserts inspired by Barbies signature colour, pink!

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Next Baking Master: Paris
programme.desc: The American bakers attempt to perfect the souffle. Then, they go big with a pâte à choux dough dessert that spotlights the egg in three ways.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Summer Baking Championship
programme.desc: Bring 4th The Sweets. Jesse Palmer challenges the three finalists to make amusement park treats. Then, the bakers serve sparkler-studded 4th of July parade float cakes for the title!

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Design director and home cook Alexis is left speechless when Eddie Jackson surprises her with a face-off against celebrity chef Geoffrey Zakarian.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Asiņu grāmatas
programme.desc: Uz Klaivas Bārkeres šausmu romāniem balstīta filma, kurā trīs stāsti saplūst vienā laikā un telpā, liekot skatītāju elpai aizrauties un sirdij pukstēt neveselīgi ātri.

programme.title: Spiegu tilts
programme.desc: Režisora Stīvena Spīlberga drāmā filmējas Toms Henkss kā advokāts, kuram jāpiedalās ASV un PSRS ieslodzījumā esošo spiegu apmaiņas pārrunās. Vēsturiskās drāmas darbība notiek Aukstā kara laikā. Bruklinas finanšu juristam Džeimsam Donovanam (Toms Henkss) uzdod veikt pārrunas par ieslodzīto apmaiņu: amerikāņu pilots, kuru notrieca virs PSRS, jāapmaina pret padomju spiegu, kurš uz 45 gadiem ieslodzīts par spiegošanu ASV. No sākuma Džeimsu biedējošā, taču drīz iedvesmojošā operācija kļūst par sarežģītu izaicinājumu. Lai arī viņš sāk pārvarēt sastaptos šķēršļus, jurists drīz saprot, ka ir radījis apdraudējumu savai ģimenei.

programme.title: Kliedziens
programme.desc: "Scream" turpinājumā Ghostface slepkavībās izdzīvojušie atstāj Vudsboro un sāk jaunu dzīvi Ņujorkā.

programme.title: Dinozauriņš Diplodoks
programme.desc: Titulētais dinozauriņš dodas piedzīvojumā, lai glābtu savus vecākus, kuri pazuduši mīklainos apstākļos. Ceļā viņš sastaps ne vien burvi un divus dīvainus zinātniekus, bet arī fantastiskas būtnes un nokļūs apbrīnojamās vietās.

programme.title: Kaskadieris
programme.desc: Kolts ir kaskadieris, un, tāpat kā visi kaskadieri, darbā viņš tiek spridzināts, sašauts, avarē, lec laukā pa logiem un krīt no augstākajām virsotnēm – tas viss mūsu izklaidei. Tagad šim strādnieku šķiras varonim, pēc negadījuma, kas teju maksā viņam dzīvību, ir jāatrod pazudusi kinozvaigzne, jāatrisina sazvērestība uzņemšanas laukumā un jāmēģina atgūt mūža mīlestība Džodija, vienlaikus darot savu ikdienas darbu. Kas te var nenoiet greizi?

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs — ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Mēs atkal esam klāt
programme.desc: Pēc Donnas nāves Sofija gatavojas piepildīt mātes ilgi loloto sapni – atvērt viesnīcu. Tomēr gaidāmos svētkus aizēno domstarpības ar Skaju, kurš strādā Ņujorkā un pat nenojauš par... gaidāmo bērniņu! Kā Sofija tiks ar visu galā viena pati? Par laimi, palīgā nāk mammas draudzenes, kuras izstāsta Sofijai, ar kādu drosmi un pārliecību savulaik šai vietā jaunu dzīvi uzsāka viņas māte. Tālajā 1979. gadā jaunā Donna nupat kā bija absolvējusi universitāti un gatavojās ceļot pa pasauli. Parīzē viņa satika Hariju, kurš, par spīti savam naivumam, viņu spēja apburt. Vēlāk, nokavējusi prāmi uz Kalokairi, Donna iepazinās ar Bilu, kurš piedāvāja viņu aizvest. Un tad... Tad Donna sastapa Semu, kurā neprātīgi iemīlējās, taču viņš salauza Donnas sirdi, bet ne spēcīgo garu.

programme.title: Pa dona Kihota pēdām
programme.desc: "Pa dona Kihota pēdām" ir neparasts un piedzīvojumu pilns ceļojums visai ģimenei, kas seko 11 gadus vecajam Alfonso, dona Kihota mantiniekam, un viņa trīs iedomātajiem trušiem, kuriem piebiedrojas Pančo un Viktorija. Ar savas draudzības spēku viņi izglābj no milzu vētras savu mīļoto pilsētu kaut kur Lamančā. Viņi sapņo neiespējamu sapni, pārvar bailes un izmanto savu iztēli, lai atklātu īsto vētras cēloni.

programme.title: Girl You Know Its True: Milli Vanilli stāsts
programme.desc: Filmas centrā ir patiess stāsts par bēdīgi slaveno skandālu, kurā dejotāji Roberts Pilatuss un Fabriss Morvans kļuva slaveni astoņdesmito gadu beigās kā popmūzikas sensācija Milli Vanilli. Mūzikas producenta Frenka Fariana vadībā viņi kļuva par pasaules mēroga zvaigznēm, ar trim hitiem Nr. 1 ASV. Taču tikai neliels cilvēku loks zina, ka duets nevis dzied, bet sinhronizē lūpas ar divu citu mākslinieku balsīm. Savas slavas virsotnē Milli Vanilli iegūst Grammy balvu, taču, kad patiesība tiek atklāta, pasaule ir lieciniece vienam no lielākajiem skandāliem mūzikas vēsturē.

programme.title: Konklāvs
programme.desc: Pēc pāvesta negaidītās nāves katoļu kardinālu kolēģija sapulcējas Vatikānā uz vēlēšanām, lai izvēlētos jauno pāvestu un iezīmētu jauno baznīcas laikmetu. Aiz Siksta kapelas slēgtajām durvīm kardināli no visas pasaules sacenšas par šo godu rūpīgi sargātā rituālā, kas sakņojas gadsimtiem tālā pagātnē. Kardinālam Lorensam (Reifs Fainss), kardinālu kolēģijas dekānam, ir svētais pienākums pārraudzīt šo konklāvu.

programme.title: Cerība uzvarai
programme.desc: Amerika Lielās Depresijas gados. Bijušais bokseris Džeimss Bredoks pēc traumas boksa ringā izmisīgi cenšas nodrošināt savai ģimenei iztiku. Pārciešot visgrūtāko posmu savā dzīvē, viņš atrod sevī spēkus un cerību uzvarai, lai atgrieztos ringā un kļūtu par čempionu. Viņa ceļš uz slavas virsotni grūtajā laikā iedvesmo daudzus cilvēkus. Filmas pamatā ir patiess stāsts par leģendāro amerikāņu bokseri Džeimsu Bredoku (1905-1974), kurš, pateicoties savam nesalaužamajam garam un spējai piepildīt savus sapņus, ieguva iesauku "Pelnrušķis".

programme.title: Lī
programme.desc: Patiesais stāsts par fotogrāfi Elizabeti "Lī" Milleri, modes modeli, kura kļuva par atzītu kara korespondenti Vogue žurnālam Otrā pasaules kara laikā.

programme.title: SKS
programme.desc: Tuvā nākotnē uz Starptautiskas kosmosa stacijas klāja valda spriedze: starp apkalpes locekļu vadības komandām uz zemes izcēlies konflikts. Gan ASV, gan krievijas astronauti saņem pavēles visiem iespējamajiem līdzekļiem pārņemt kontroli stacijā savās rokās.

programme.title: Maja Ma
programme.desc: Pallavi Patela ir indiešu vidusmēra ģimenes sieva, pazīstama ar savu dejotprasmi un kulinārijas mākslu. Dēla Teja saderināšanās vakars draud izgāzties, jo paklīdušas tenkas par priekšzīmīgo mājsaimnieci Pallavi.

programme.title: Nelabojamais Rons
programme.desc: Katram bērnam ir jābūt savam draugam. Par tādu var kļūt lielisks robots, kurš prot kustēties, runāt un kuram ir pieslēgums internetam. Šādi roboti ir visiem skolēniem, bet tikai ne kautrīgajam Bārnijam. Visu izmaina dzimšanas diena, kad viņš saņem ilgi gaidīto dāvanu, taču robots Rons izrādās brāķēts, un viņa jaunais īpašnieks nolemj pašrocīgi iemācīt robotam visu, ko zina un prot pats.

programme.title: Brīnišķīga diena kaimiņos
programme.desc: Freds Rodžerss, vārds, kas Latvijas iedzīvotājam neko neizsaka, bet ASV ir ārkārtīgi populārs bērnu raidījumu vadītājs ar nevainojamu reputāciju. Bet vai tiešām kāds var būt tik balts un pūkains? Loids Vogels, izmeklējošais žurnālists, ir saņēmis uzdevumu satikties ar Fredu Rodžersu un sagatavot par Misteru Rodžersu interviju. Viņš ar skepsi aizsāk savu plānoto interviju, acumirklī apjaušot, ka ir grūti noticēt, ka kāds var būt tik labdabīgs. Tomēr Rodžera empātija, jaukums un labestība drīz vien liek Vogelam pārdomāt paša dzīves pagātnes sāpīgākos brīžus.

programme.title: Grāmatu zagle
programme.desc: Filma "Grāmatu zagle", kuras pamatā ir pasaulē populārs romāns, ir stāsts par neparastu, enerģisku meiteni, kuru Otrā pasaules kara laikā Vācijā nosūta dzīvot audžuģimenē. Meiteni ieintriģē vienīgā grāmata, ko viņa paņēmusi līdzi, tāpēc viņa sāk kolekcionēt grāmatas. Ar savu jauno vecāku un zem kāpnēm mītošā slepenā viesa palīdzību meitene iemācās lasīt un izveido brīnumainu pasauli, kas iedvesmo viņus visus.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Ričards ir jauns zvirbulēns, kuru savā lokā pieņēmusi stārķu ģimene. Viņš pavada ziemu Āfrikas ziemeļos, taču ir pienācis laiks atgriezties mājās. Ričards vēlas vadīt gājputnu kāsi, bet šim uzdevumam tiek izraudzīts viņa pusbrālis Makss. Jaunais putnēns jūtas aizvainots, taču drīz sākas vētrains piedzīvojums. Tirāniskais pāvs Zamano sagūsta Ričarda draugu. Zamano atsakās viņu laist brīvībā, kamēr Ričards neatrisinās mīklu un neatradīs Zamano dārgakmeni.

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Žoslēns ir veiksmīgs biznesmenis, toties mīlas dzīvē – patmīlīgs brunču mednieks. Kad viņš mēģina jau atkal savaldzināt jaunu sievieti, izliekoties, ka ir ratiņkrēslā, viņa iepazīstina Žoslēnu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām piesaistīta dzīvei ratiņkrēslā.

programme.title: Vēl pa vienai
programme.desc: Oskarotā Tomasa Vinterberga filma par četriem draugiem un kolēģiem, ģimnāzijas skolotājiem. Visi četri cīnās ar nemotivētiem skolēniem un jūtas iestrēguši rutīnā. Nikolaja 40 gadu jubilejā draugu sarunas noved pie norvēģu psihiatra Finna Skorderuda teorijas, ka cilvēks dzīvo ar 0,05 promiļu iztrūkumu. Četrotne nolemj veikt eksperimentu un pārbaudīt šo teoriju dzīvē. Tomēr, eksperimentam turpinoties, vīri sastopas katrs ar savu personīgās dzīves izaicinājumu.

programme.title: Everests
programme.desc: 1996. gada 10. maija rītā divas alpīnistu komandas uzsāk pēdējo posmu ceļā uz Everestu, kas ir pasaules augstākā virsotne. Piepeši kalnu grēdu pārņem negaiss, un piedzīvojumu meklētājiem ceļu aizšķērso cilvēces vēsturē spēcīgākā sniega vētra. Šajos skarbajos apstākļos komandām ir jāiztur stindzinoši brāzmains vējš un mežonīgs aukstums, lai izdzīvotu gandrīz neiespējamā situācijā.

programme.title: Bildinājums
programme.desc: Ambiciozā Ņujorkas izdevniecības vadītāja Margareta ir gatavā vellata, un viņas darbinieki visi kā viens dabū no bargās priekšnieces trūkties. Īpaši smagi klājas asistentam Endrjū, kuram Margaretas dēļ nākas strādāt pat brīvdienās. Taču kādu dienu nevainojamajai Margaretas dzīvei rodas nopietns apdraudējums – uzturēšanās atļauja ASV ir beigusies, un viņai draud deportācija uz dzimto Kanādu. Lai nepazaudētu prestižo darbu, viņai atliek tikai viena iespēja – likt kādam no saviem padotajiem viņu bildināt un noslēgt fiktīvas laulības. Pirmais Margaretas ceļā trāpās Endrjū.

programme.title: Mirušie nesāpina
programme.desc: Divi pionieri Amerikas pilsoņu kara laikā frontē cīnās par savu dzīvību un mīlestību.

programme.title: Uz visu banku
programme.desc: Prinstonas absolvents Ričijs uzskata, ka ir piekrāpts, tāpēc dodas uz Kostariku, lai izteiktu savas pretenzijas interneta azartspēļu magnātu Aivenu Bloku. Ričiju iekārdina Bloka solītā pasakainā bagātība, taču drīz vien viņš uzzina biedējošu patiesību par savu labdari. Kad FIB cenšas piespiest Ričiju palīdzēt tikt galā ar Bloku, puisi gaida mūža lielākais risks: viņam jāmēģina pārspēt abi draudīgie spēki.

programme.title: Hronikas veidotāji
programme.desc: Trīs vidusskolēni atklāj kaut ko ļoti neparastu, kas apvelta viņus ar pārdabiskām un neizprotamām spējām. Kad trijotne mācās kontrolēt savas spējas un izmantot tās savā labā, viņu dzīve sāk kļūt nekontrolējama, un virsroku gūst puišu rakstura tumšā puse.

programme.title: Argentīna,
programme.desc: Sacenšoties ar laiku, 80. gados juristu komanda neticamā cīņā cenšas atmaskot Argentīnas asiņainās militārās diktatūras vadītājus.

programme.title: ATP Toronto. Singles Final. K. Khachanov - B. Shelton
programme.desc: Coverage of all the action from the annual outdoor hard court tennis tournament which takes place in Canada.

The British and Irish Lions is a unique rugby union team that brings together best players from England, Ireland, Scotland and Wales.

Futbols: LaLiga. Pirms sezonas apskats 2025/26
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

The regular season is played from May to September, the All Star game is played midway through the season in July and the WNBA Finals at the end of September until the beginning of October.

programme.title: NHL 2024/25. Izslēgšanas spēļu apskats
programme.desc: The Stanley Cup Final in ice hockey is the National Hockey League (NHL) championship series to determine the winner of the Stanley Cup, the oldest professional sports trophy in North America. The trophy is awarded annually to the National Hockey League (NHL) playoff champion club. It was presented by the Governor General of Canada Lord Stanley of Preston in 1892 and is the oldest professional sports trophy in North America.

Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: Chase Morrill takes his family and his team deep into the Italian countryside to hunt for the next big renovation project.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn purchase an abandoned house in Pearl City with rotting floors and work tirelessly on a stunning renovation to honour its legacy.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Vintage Flip

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina Rodriguez take their passion for vintage homes to the next level. They find and buy historic homes to restore and sell at a profit.

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Tiny Luxury
programme.desc: Husband and wife Tyson and Michelle Spiess are founders of Tiny Heirloom, a unique building company focussing on the construction of tiny, luxury homes. In this reality series we follow them as they construct homes under 400 square feet (37 square metres) into glorious, high-end, miniature mansions, showing that downsizing doesnt have to compromise comfort and style. Based in Portland, Oregon, the family run company helps customers fulfill their real estate dreams, squeezing every wish and request into these tiny homes, allowing them to enjoy every aspect of their new, pint-sized properties.

programme.desc: Jon must repair or tear down a damaged cabin. Also, Jons mum and sister help transform a mouse infested nightmare into a romantic couples cabin.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer: Camp Revamp
programme.desc: Jonathan is just weeks away from opening day and races to be ready for campers. Also, Jon and his husband renovate a 1930s house for themselves.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Hayley wants to transform her home while her three sons are on a two-week holiday. Jennifer plans to create storage space and revamp the cluttered kitchen.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Jennifer helps a family-of-five who have $70,000 to spend on a renovation. She plans to create a relaxing bathroom with heated floors and a big shower.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Log Cabin Living

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: A spin-off of My Lottery Dream Home that follows British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen as he tries to help a number of lottery winners from Europe find a perfect home. Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: Battle on the Beach
programme.desc: Three skilled teams hit the beach to renovate identical beachfront properties. With some help from Ty Pennington, Alison Victoria and Taniya Nayak, theyll compete to wow the judges with their home remodels and walk away with a $50,000 cash prize!

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The Morrill family and their crew work with the locals on taking the house from demolition through their first big project: an Italian Bathroom.

programme.title: Down Home Fab

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Hoping to inspire guests, Joanna transforms the Seed and Supply building at the Silos into a flower art workshop and crafting space.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Joanna updates an entry foyer and dining room with an elegant take on the homeowners Southwestern style, using earthy colours and refined details.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The series premiere focuses on Anstead renovating her new home following her divorce with Tarek El Moussa, with whom they hosted Flip or Flop show. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: The seven-episode series follows Carmine, a real estate agent and interior designer, and Mike, a landscape designer, as they each pitch their design plans to clients. The budget is set, so the guys must be persuasive to score a bigger chunk of the dollars to either max out the interiors or make the most of the outdoor spruce up.

programme.title: Vacation House for Free
programme.desc: Vacation House for Free is a reality TV show hosted by Matt Blashaw, real estate expert and licensed contractor with fantastic handyman skills he gained while working at his fathers lumberyard through college. Matt makes dreams come true for those who want to buy a vacation house and be mortgage free, he teaches them how to use rental income to cover the costs of owning it. Matt finds a property at a right price, renovates it and places it on the rental market. So his clients can get income when not living there and by doing so they get it for free.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: Groups of independent shippers compete with each other in this American reality series, as they bid for the right to haul unconventional items that many conventional carriers deem unfeasible to transport. programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island

Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the days championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criterias, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: American Pickers is an American reality series that follows ingenious "pickers" Mike Wolfe, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value. They travel around the United States to buy or "pick" various items for resale, for clients, or for their own personal collections. Danielle Colby is in charge of their office of Antique Archaeology.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: Groups of independent shippers compete with each other in this American reality series, as they bid for the right to haul unconventional items that many conventional carriers deem unfeasible to transport. The crews must first win the right to ship the items by bidding on uShip, an online auction house that is one of the largest of its kind in the world. Once they have won the contract, they prepare the items for shipping, which is often easier said than done. The crews performances are scrutinised throughout, and their operational abilities are pushed to their limits as they transport both bizarre and tricky shipments across the country.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a film crew discover proof of a dinosaur living in the African Congo? Are reports of the strange lights above the Hessdalen Valley in Norway a sign of extraterrestrial activity? And has NASA uncovered proof of an alien structure on an asteroid?

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Documentary series in which YouTube sensation Beau Ouimette, an experienced river detectorist, teams up with presenter Rick Edwards, to search the UKs rivers and waterways in an attempt to find underwater archaeological treasures. The pair wil visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain, where some iconic events and battles took place. By using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, they will find various artefacts under layers of silt and rocks, which they will take to local archaeologists and historians to uncover the stories behind the finds.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: The Loch Ness Monsters possible demise is investigated by Robert Rines, who saw remains while mapping the lake floor. MonsterQuest uses ROVs, sonar, and cameras in search of evidence for Nessies death at the lakes bottom.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In Texarkanas marshy swamp, a legendary beast haunts a small Arkansas town, immortalised in "The Legend of Boggy Creek". Violent nocturnal attacks and remarkable tracks left fear and panic in its wake.

programme.title: Countdown To Apocalypse
programme.desc: According to the Book of Revelation, the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse will usher in four divine judgments that promise to devastate humanity. Some believe its dark imagery is coming to fruition in modern times.

programme.title: Mummy Forensics
programme.desc: These group of dedicated Egyptologists and archaeologists use their wealth of scientific knowledge to piece together the available evidence and identify how these mummies died. Led by Joann Fletcher, an honorary visiting professor at the University of York, the team take a close look at mummies from Egypt and South America to solve these age-old deaths. Using state-of-the-art technology, they are able to reconstruct the mummys faces, discovering who they were and the extent and detail of their injuries. Working carefully is paramount so as not to disturb the remains, and these mummy experts often find, there is more than meets the eye with these historic human bodies.

programme.title: Bible Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Documentary series in which viewers have a chance to explore the mysteries and reveal secrets and hidden facts of the worlds most famous and oldest book - the Bible. For thousands of years, The Holy Bible has been the foundation on which Judaism and Christianity are built, but there are still many secrets and things which can be interpreted differently. Featuring stunning on-location photography, interesting reenactments and interviews with scientists, archaeologists and religious leaders, this series will take us on remarkable journey back in time to see what the Old Testament and the New Testament are hiding from us - from Dead Sea Scrolls, examinations of the traditional belief that Moses wrote the Torah, to whether Adam and Eve were created together or one before the other, who authored the New Testament and many other mysteries.

programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Countdown To Apocalypse
programme.desc: According to the Book of Revelation, the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse will usher in four divine judgments that promise to devastate humanity. Some believe its dark imagery is coming to fruition in modern times.

programme.title: Mummy Forensics
programme.desc: These group of dedicated Egyptologists and archaeologists use their wealth of scientific knowledge to piece together the available evidence and identify how these mummies died. Led by Joann Fletcher, an honorary visiting professor at the University of York, the team take a close look at mummies from Egypt and South America to solve these age-old deaths. Using state-of-the-art technology, they are able to reconstruct the mummys faces, discovering who they were and the extent and detail of their injuries. Working carefully is paramount so as not to disturb the remains, and these mummy experts often find, there is more than meets the eye with these historic human bodies.

programme.title: Bible Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Documentary series in which viewers have a chance to explore the mysteries and reveal secrets and hidden facts of the worlds most famous and oldest book - the Bible. For thousands of years, The Holy Bible has been the foundation on which Judaism and Christianity are built, but there are still many secrets and things which can be interpreted differently. Featuring stunning on-location photography, interesting reenactments and interviews with scientists, archaeologists and religious leaders, this series will take us on remarkable journey back in time to see what the Old Testament and the New Testament are hiding from us - from Dead Sea Scrolls, examinations of the traditional belief that Moses wrote the Torah, to whether Adam and Eve were created together or one before the other, who authored the New Testament and many other mysteries.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Documentary series in which YouTube sensation Beau Ouimette, an experienced river detectorist, teams up with presenter Rick Edwards, to search the UKs rivers and waterways in an attempt to find underwater archaeological treasures. The pair wil visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain, where some iconic events and battles took place. By using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, they will find various artefacts under layers of silt and rocks, which they will take to local archaeologists and historians to uncover the stories behind the finds.
